title: I’m writing a book about teens from different zones who escape to overthrow the government. What are some plot ideas and plot twists? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hiya Molly Simpson, I love answering requests but I will not be answering this one. I’m not in the habit of planning other people’s stories for them. Your story, you do the work. To ask a bunch of strangers on the Internet for plot ideas is lazy.

I hate to sound old and everything, but what do teenagers know about overthrowing and then setting up a new and improved government? And who is going to keep the lights on, keep the water flowing, and pick up the trash once the Wonder-Twins and their band of roughnecks destroy the economy and infrastructure?
